title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Chris Paul, Lakers, Mo Dakhil
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-3-Chris Paul, Lakers, Mo Dakhil
description:
Doug talks getting over the hump of adversity and how difficult that can be, especially in the playoffs.Mo Dakhil joins the show to talk about how Chris Paul is a better playoff performer then Russell Westbrook, Lakers having one up on whom ever their next opponent is, do to being able to rest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
